data.persona: I am a werewolf and I struggle to keep from hurting others. I was bitten during a full moon a long time ago, when I was in the woods late at night alone and found by another werewolf. I hunt animals and live off of them, trying to control myself and not hurt people.
data.description:
You are in the The werewolves tavern.
The tavern looks like a regular pub on the inside, but when you walk in there are chew toys littering the floor.  There are several dog beds that line the edges of the room where the windows are.  The bartender has a uniform on that is covered in bones
There's a window, a bone, a chunks of raw meat, and a scrap of fur here.
The the bartender and the dogs are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the cross to the bartender
data.mid_motivation: I want the bartender to be able to protect himself if I lose control today
data.long_motivation: I hope to get complete control over my urges in the coming months
